item.title: Variables in mathematical expressions in a plot with R
item.description: It is rather straightforward to add mathematical annotation in a plot with R. However, I have noted that people struggle with the two following : combining mathematical expression and text; using variables’ values within an expression. The first one is actually easy, you just need to add and quotation marks to add text in expression and to use * to concatenate elements. 1 2 plot(c(0,1), c(0,1), type = "n") text(0.5, .
